title: Sneak Peek of our New Guest Rooms
seo_title: Sneak Peek of our New Guest Rooms
meta_description: Can you dig our new guest rooms that we are rolling out?
short_description: Can you dig our new guest rooms that we are rolling out?
long_description:
Can you dig our new guest rooms that we are rolling out? Right now construction is happening as we give all of our guest rooms an edgy, yet inviting feel that match our newly redesigned Entrance, Lobby, Library, and Fitness Center.

 

Here’s more detailed look at our rooms and what you can expect when you come stay with us:

 

Hallway unlike any other

To say we are pumped about our new look for our guest floors is an understatement. As soon as you step off of the elevator you will see graphic carpets in our hallway that depict downtown high rises- a nod to our Nob Hill views of downtown San Francisco. The doors have been painted a sleek dark blue. It’s pretty awesome.

 

Neutral palette with jewel tone accents

We worked with renowned design firm EDG to give our rooms an updated look but with a nod to our California cool past. The colors are comforting and inviting, just like your own home. Our vision was to create a home away from home so that guests traveling for business and pleasure feel relaxed. The jewel tones in the carpet and accessories compliment the neutral palette of the bed and bathroom.

 

Cool but comfortable

Looking great is one thing, but being comfortable is another thing we take seriously- very, seriously. We’ve always been known for our insanely comfortable beds and the option to select a pillow based on your firmness preference, and with our updates we wanted to keep the comfort but add some style to the guest room experience.

 

Be sure to follow us on Instagram to see more behind the scenes of our new look!
